Title: The 39 Steps
Writer: John Buchan (adapted from the novel by), Charles Bennett (adaptation), Ian Hay (dialogue)
Actors: Robert Donat, Madeleine Carroll, Lucie Mannheim, Godfrey Tearle
Plot: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.
